title: resolution problem
body:
i started a game and when the loading screen pop up it said to my to check the cable connection.

please help me

replies.body:
Cable connection? If you mean the monitor out of range or your monitor goes black, then the *Alt+Enter* workaround *Thenamesed* mentioned will work.

If that isn't the issue, can you provide a few more details of what specific error you're seeing?

I'm getting the same thing so far lost two games cause of this not going to try again until they do a hotifx or something. The whole pressing alt+enter for each game is frustrating at best and worse that you cant play full screen and even if you try your mouse doesn't click properly.
